title: 如何检测生物
author: Ghost_Last
txt_content:
如何检测一个生物和一个tag为z的生物x轴距离在6以内，y轴相同，z轴相同。
说白了就是r=6去掉y轴=6，z轴=6，只检测x轴=6内的生物
版本1.12.2

replies.author: llc1
replies.txt_content: 这个要定一个指定的x坐标，不让很难弄

replies.author: llc1
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 llc1 于 2020-4-10 22:06 编辑 

不过还是有解决方案的

前置指令：/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["a"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["b"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["a1"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["b1"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["a2"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["b2"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["a3"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["b3"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["a4"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["b4"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["a5"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["b5"],Invisible:1,Rotation:[0f],Pose:{Head:[0f,0f,0f],Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f]}}
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=a] ~6 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=b] ~-6 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=a1] ~5 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=b1] ~-5 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=a2] ~4 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=b2] ~-4 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=a3] ~3 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=b3] ~-3 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=a4] ~2 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=b4] ~-2 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=a5] ~1 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=z] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=b5] ~-1 ~ ~
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=a] ~ ~ ~ executa @e[tag=!a,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=b] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!b,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=a1] ~ ~ ~ executa @e[tag=!a1,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=b1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!b1,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=a2] ~ ~ ~ executa @e[tag=!a2,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=b2] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!b2,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=a3] ~ ~ ~ executa @e[tag=!a3,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=b3] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!b3,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=a4] ~ ~ ~ executa @e[tag=!a4,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=b4] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!b4,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=a5] ~ ~ ~ executa @e[tag=!a5,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1
重复执行：/execute @e[tag=b5] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=!b5,r=1] ~ ~ ~ say 1

replies.author: llc1
replies.txt_content: 补充下上面原理，在tag=z的生物x轴的6格以内（正和负）召唤大量隐形盔甲架，感应盔甲架是否有人碰到，如果有人碰到就说1，当然。最后那12行后面的say 1可以改成其他指令，最佳答案给个啊qwq

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: llc1
replies.txt_content:
nonono
关了指令提示完全（不确定，看你配置）不卡
